Business Analyst Wholesale
Be part of an iconic story.

PVH is the growth platform for Calvin Klein and TOMMY HILFIGER. Through driving brand strength and relevance, we are connecting our global, iconic brands closer to where the consumer is going than ever before, today and with future generations. Guided by our values and enabled by our scale and global reach, we are driving fashion forward for good, as one team with one vision and one plan. That’s the Power of Us, that’s the Power of PVH+.
The Team

The PVH Southeast Hub is one of the most dynamic Hub organizations within PVH. We are responsible for developing the PVH brands (Tommy Hilfiger and Calvin Klein) in the emerging markets such as Italy, Turkey, Greece, Middle East, Africa, and the CIS region. While covering a massive area counting 45+ countries, our hub is extremely diverse (25+ nationalities) and has strong potential. We are ambitious and committed to unlocking our full potential and to optimize the positioning of PVH in our markets.

In this ever-changing environment the opportunities are almost endless. We believe we can outcompete our best competitors through strong (consumer & product) focus and (cross-territorial) collaboration.

Associates working for the Southeast Hub are excited in managing and building relationships with our partners and colleagues across various cultures and backgrounds and enjoy a fast paced and dynamic work environment. We look for our associates to be true bridge builders, have a ‘hands-on’ mentality and thriving in a multi-cultural, territorial channel and divisional environment.
The Position

Reporting to the Manager Business Analysis Wholesale, this business partnering role will support the wholesale commercial finance team across the Region accountable for combining financial and market data to create better insight in business performance and opportunities.
Run the forecasting and budget process and consolidate the local market figures to provide the Wholesale overview for the Hub
Work to identify ways to streamline wholesale financial reporting and make the preparation of such reports more efficient
Partner with Wholesale Operations to manage, forecast and reach sales target, identifying potential risks and opportunities for revenue growth
Support financial and operational projects in place within the business by being the key finance stakeholder on a variety of wholesale projects across Hub
Partner with Wholesale team to manage key partners across the Hub providing accurate data
Monitoring sales campaign and analyze trends and Kpi by countries / channels
Support the Wholesale Team on blueprint distribution, segmentation, brand elevation, tiering approach, cbtt, dilution and cancellation
Partner with key stakeholders across the Hub to understand their financial reporting needs
Responsible for providing accurate, timely and reliable information which supports and shapes our strategic direction.
Work closely with the Wholesale department in providing the relevant financial information to support their key strategic initiatives
The Ideal Candidate
Master’s degree in business administration, Finance, or Economics
Ideally 3 years of previous experience as Controller or Business Analyst in a structured and fast paced environment
Proficient with Office applications with advanced Excel skills
SAP FMS and SAP Analysis experienced is a plus
Fluent in English (both spoken and written)
Analytical mindset with strong attention to details
Positive and proactive attitude, Inquisitive and willing to learn
Honest, trustworthy, team player and able to positively interact with stakeholders at all levels

Be valued.  At PVH, we recognize that our people are our greatest asset. Develop  – PVH University curates and delivers training programs for you to continuously develop your professional and personal goals.

Be part of it.

PVH Europe and our brands, TOMMY HILFIGER and CALVIN KLEIN, are committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse community of associates with a strong sense of belonging. column1: 3,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=1314fb2174731c87&bb=Bezejk2an5QnzkXfzixKovkWK98j6WU_e_GTTY0voYWJ7_JVyBu5cP3agxgX74NnrCvnE3frk4Xi3B87NIaUKXzoRFWJ6z6f2q0ISDz5cqvV7Vf3g7ECQE1cjtJFh5Vy&xkcb=SoCL67M37Le5vZAKV70GbzkdCdPP&fccid=7991f5ede7f784c6&vjs=3,Product+Analyst,"Milano, Lombardia",Business analyst,Bending Spoons,"Remoto in Milano, Lombardia",52.246 € all'anno,"At Bending Spoons, we’re striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards. To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform—which comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor’s attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator. For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That’s our promise to such a candidate.
A few examples of your responsibilities
Develop and test product growth strategies (including pricing, advertising, and product launches) to help our products and brands flourish to their full, market-leading potential.
Manage existing growth activities (including performance marketing, contests, re-engagement, and more) to keep our campaigns resonant, successful, and capable of enhancing the brand of each product.
Work on measurement strategy to monitor performance, with the help of our talented engineers and data analysts.
Contribute to product development, proposing improvements to the customer funnel and suggesting new features that would make each product more marketable.
Study the market and competition intensely, and identify new strategies to help our products and brands reach ever-increasing heights.
Design tests and strategies that account for every conceivable scenario, making sure that we proceed in the most effective direction.
What we look for

Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.

Drive. You’re extremely ambitious in everything you do—and your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high—and rising—bar.

Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You’re reliable, honest, and transparent.
Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.
What we offer
Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You’ll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.

An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential—then, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you’ve got what it takes, you’ll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.

Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of €52,246. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between €63,965 and €143,330. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.

All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.
Before you apply

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We’re extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don’t hesitate to apply.
The selection process

We welcome applications in English and Italian. If you pass our screening, we’ll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you’re successful with those, we’ll invite you to a series of interviews. Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested at accommodations-ext@bendingspoons.com. Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn’t a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply."

3,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=0e420f31f57776e4&bb=Bezejk2an5QnzkXfzixKot1elz_FHLZ0hRyb8POkMyi70z9n0dE4s_GTTGVgJu3lpXfkgmF7K7P9p4Hs0g2Q0IGUdbR1M-OPC1gIE28mlDg-Uw8hFcNqe-1Li2tkfiw9&xkcb=SoAW67M37Le5vZAKV70FbzkdCdPP&fccid=d1c83d413f5ece45&vjs=3,Product+Analyst,"Milano, Lombardia",Pricing Analyst,sennder,"Remoto in Milano, Lombardia",Not available,"sennder is Europe’s leading digital freight forwarder. In a traditional industry, we are moving fast to digitize and automate all road logistics processes. We move trucks with courage and the power of data to unlock endless and sustainable capacity at exceptional quality. Get to know us better by reviewing our ""\*\* \*\*"" presentation.   We are a growing team looking for a Pricing Analyst in the Pricing department to help us on our journey to revolutionize road freight logistics. The role is located in our Milan office.   WHAT YOU WILL DO …   The pricing team is essential in shaping and implementing pricing strategies tailored to the Italian market to enhance profitability and competitiveness. Our mission is to deliver optimal pricing through rigorous analysis, innovative product development, and strategic process improvements. The team is responsible for crafting pricing strategies, ensuring their implementation, and continuously monitoring performance.   As a Pricing Analyst, you will play a crucial role in shaping and executing pricing strategies specifically for the Italian market. You will collaborate closely with Operations, Procurement, and Sales teams to ensure that pricing strategies align with market demands and company goals, while maintaining compliance and operational efficiency.   As our business continues to grow, we seek individuals with strong problem-solving and project management skills who can support our teams and navigate the complexities of our evolving needs. If you're resilient, adaptable, and passionate about driving pricing excellence, this role is for you.    In this role, you will:

Data-Driven Insight: Dive deep into data, identify opportunities for improvement, and present data-driven recommendations to stakeholders. Maintain and optimize data models, create BI dashboards, and use advanced analytics to support the Pricing Team’s objectives.

Strategic Execution: Develop and execute pricing strategies that enhance profitability and competitiveness within the Italian market. Monitor and analyze pricing performance, making necessary adjustments to meet profitability targets.

Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with Operations, Sales, and Procurement teams to ensure pricing strategies align with market demands and comply with local regulations and company policies. Act as a liaison between the pricing team and other departments to ensure strategic alignment.
Market and Competitive Analysis: Conduct thorough market and competitor analyses to identify opportunities and threats. Adjust pricing models in response to market conditions and competitive actions.

Operational Support: Be resourceful and adaptable, supporting various initiatives across the business by working with cross-functional stakeholders. Support pricing planning processes by providing clear insights into historical and forecasted pricing performance.
Empowering Teams: Passionately democratize data and empower your team by providing actionable insights and fostering collaboration across the organization.

Innovation and Improvement: Identify and leverage external data sources to enhance understanding of sennder’s performance and market trends. Continuously seek and implement improvements in pricing processes and analytics.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
A graduate degree in Business, Mathematics, Engineering, Economics, or another quantitative field is required
column2: a Master’s degree is preferred.

column1: 3+ years of experience in a quantitative/analytical role, ideally within tech, solutions consulting, or logistics.
Demonstrated experience in developing and executing pricing strategies, particularly within the Italian market or similar regional focus.
Experience working in a pricing department and knowledge of the logistics/transportation industry are pluses.
Strong skills in Excel/Google Sheets, SQL for analyzing and interpreting large datasets to deliver actionable insights. Python/R experience is a plus.
Experience with Business Visualization tools, with LookML experience being a plus.
Familiarity with ETL processes
column2: experience with tools like Fivetran and dbt is advantageous.

column1: Strong analytical skills with the ability to monitor and optimize pricing performance.
Ability to self-serve, investigate, and gather necessary data independently to drive insights and improvements.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to synthesize information quickly, highlight key takeaways, and communicate actionable insights clearly and concisely.
Proven ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration and alignment on strategic goals.
Fluency in English, both written and spoken.
A self-starter mentality with the ability to adapt to a fast-paced, dynamic environment

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT…   At sennder, we want to maximize the individual potential of all employees and reinforce an inclusive culture and environment of continuous learning that empowers people to succeed as a team. In addition to humility, we value commitment, team spirit and respect to build fruitful collaboration across teams. Learn more about who we are on
Fast growth scale-up with an international team of 1000 people, 74+ nationalities spread across 11 European offices. With English as our common language, we are able to work together.
Learning and development on the job and with the support of a bi-annual review process, learning allowance, high potential programs, sennder onboarding academy, and internal trainings.
Various opportunities to connect with colleagues through regular team events and company get-togethers such as our highly anticipated sennder .
Prioritize employee engagement and mental well-being by fostering a supportive environment through the Likeminded platform and conducting regular employee satisfaction surveys.
Hybrid work model where you seamlessly merge virtual productivity and in-office collaboration with your colleagues.
Commuter allowance to assist employees with their daily travel expenses and a one-time home office benefit to ensure that you're properly equipped wherever you work.
Competitive compensation package including objective-based bonus, referral reward, and in some cases virtual option plan.
For the Milan office we offer: free on-site gym!
Vibrant offices complete with healthy snacks, focus zones, and social areas to connect with your colleagues. Click for a virtual tour and better yet, hope to see you soon!

We value humility and we're as interested in your character as we are in your talent. Please apply, even if you feel you only meet part of our listed criteria. Diversity drives our innovation and we offer a collaborative, dynamic, and international work environment. Just be yourself. We are excited to meet you and for you to join us in shaping the future of the logistics industry in Europe.   If you have any questions or need special accommodation please reach out to us at ta@sennder.com. As soon as you apply your journey with sennder begins."

Elaborazione di liste di prodotti promozionali in linea con il Piano di Animazione Commerciale.

Laurea in materie scientifiche o economico-finanziarie

Buona padronanza del pacchetto Office, in particolare Excel, e conoscenza di Qlik e Power BI
Buona conoscenza del mercato italiano e delle tendenze localI
Sei organizzato/a, orientato/a al risultato e sai lavorare in autonomia
Passione per l’analisi e per l’utilizzo dei dati per migliorare il business
Conoscenza del francese (livello minimo B1)
Disponibilità a trasferte in Francia (almeno 1 volta al mese).

TÜV SÜD brings the trust in sustainability and thus contributes to the fight against greenwashing. This position is centered around supporting companies in addressing LCA and GHG-based topics increasing their credibility on the market.

We are looking for a motivated sustainability team player with an innovative mindset. With your expertise on Life Cycle Assessment and Greenhouse Gasses topics, you will support the sustainability team in challenging LCA and GHG projects contributing to the development of the global sustainability program.

You will help building and ramping up services that support the transition of the companies towards a Circular Economy for their products and services being part of a team of specialists in the execution of these services.
YOUR TASKS:
Develop into assessing/auditing in sustainability projects with a focus on life cycle assessment studies as well as GHG studies for a variety of industries and customers.

Support the sustainability team in addressing requests from the market, taking part to the full process since the pre-engagement stage contributing to the growing business of product sustainability in both national and European context.

Supporting the sustainability team in establishing and maintaining the relevant sustainability technical knowledge by forging strong relationships with internal and external experts, academic and research institutions, technical/scientific institutions, industrial associations, and regulatory authorities (government agencies, pilot customers).
YOUR QUALIFICATION:
A degree in Engineering, Environmental Science, Materials Science or related. Graduate degree (e.g., PhD) is a plus.
2-4 years of relevant work in LCA/GHG services in consulting, third-party bodies, industry and/or academic contexts.

Good knowledge of LCA/GHG based services and related standards (ISO 14040-14044, UNI EN 15804, ISO 14025, Carbon Footprint of product/service/organization according to ISO 14067, ISO 14064, GHG Protocol).
Knowledge of additional sustainability related standards/programs (e.g., ISO 14021, PAS 2060, GRI, SBTi) is a plus.
Good knowledge of LCA software tools, e.g., SimaPro, GaBi, OpenLCA, Umberto
Good understanding on these key topics: climate change, resource efficiency, energy, carbon, sustainable materials, and supply chains.
Curious and creative.
Fluent in written and spoken English. Further foreign language skills (e.g., French, German) would be an advantage
Further Information/Weitere Informationen"

Working at Bank of America will give you a great career with opportunities to learn, grow and make an impact, along with the power to make a difference. Join us!
The team:
The Investment Banking division is organized across industry, country, and product coverage teams. Industry teams include Consumer and Retail
column2: Natural Resources
column3: Financial Institutions
column4: Financial Sponsors
column5: Healthcare
column6: Multi-Industries
column7: Real Estate, Gaming and Leisure
column8: and Technology, Media and Telecoms amongst others. Product teams cover Mergers and Acquisitions and Leveraged Finance and country teams cover all regions in Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) and are partially or fully based in regional offices. Coverage teams work together across the Investment Banking division to provide solutions to our clients on a range of strategic topics covering corporate finance, mergers and acquisitions and capital markets advice.

column1: Programme Overview

Our Off-cycle Analyst programme is designed to offer you a broad and exciting experience of work within Investment Banking. During your internship, you’ll be gaining exposure to a variety of industry, country or product coverage teams.
Training and Development

Your training and development are our top priority with extensive formal training offered at the start of the programme in addition to on-the-job support, educational speaker events and mentorship throughout.
Responsibilities:
As an Off-cycle Analyst, your key tasks and responsibilities may include but are not limited to:
Work on projects alongside bankers in specific industry, product and country coverage groups providing you with a unique learning opportunity
Help the team deliver solutions to clients leveraging the full spectrum of the bank's capabilities
Actively contribute to the preparation of client presentations and underlying financial analysis
Build relationships, knowledge and experience that will open doors to a wide range of future career opportunities
Actively participate in executing transactions, including work with clients as well as representatives of other investment banks and other advisors
Eligibility

Candidates are required to be pursuing either an undergraduate or postgraduate degree from an accredited college or university, with a graduation timeframe between January 2025 and June 2026, or recent graduates for roles starting from September 2025
Must be available to join the programme anytime from January until December 2025
What we are looking for
Essential:
Fluency in English is essential for all roles and a fluency in Italian is a strong preference
You will need to demonstrate drive, innovation, and a genuine interest in the financial markets
Teamwork, leadership, and problem-solving skills, plus creativity are key qualities, as is the ability to work in a fast-paced environment, multi-task and interact with a variety of people
Display analytical and problem-solving skills
Influence decisions and outcomes through effective communication and interpersonal skills
Demonstrate integrity and ethics by earning other’s trust and respect through consistent honesty and professionalism in all interactions
Desired:
For some roles within Emerging Markets (including sub-Sahara Africa, Russia and China), a knowledge of those regions is required
Our recruitment process

Analyst internship and full-time recruiting takes place on a rolling basis once our applications are open. Assessments often begin before the deadline, so it’s best to submit your application early as this will give you the best chance of being considered for the role.

We care deeply about shaping the world of work to be an equal and inclusive one – and that starts with our recruitment process. We know just how important and valuable it is to have a wide range of skills, backgrounds and experiences shaping our work and ideas. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds, and we’re proud to focus on attracting, retaining and developing diverse talent within Bank of America. Together, we aim to mirror the customers, clients and communities we serve.

We are an equal opportunities employer, and ensure that no applicant is subject to less favourable treatment on the grounds of gender, gender identity or gender reassignment, marital or civil partner status, race, religion or belief, colour, nationality, ethnic or national origins, age, sexual orientation, being pregnant or on maternity leave, socio-economic background, responsibilities for dependants, physical or mental disability. The Bank selects candidates for interview based on their skills, qualifications and experience.
What if I need workplace adjustments?

We’re committed to ensuring our online application process provides an equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. If you need a workplace adjustment to search for a job opening, need help completing your application or video interview, please email juniortalentemea@bofa.com and let us know. We will be more than happy to discuss the support you need, and we will respond to your email within two business days.
We offer a competitive Salary and Benefits package
Application Deadline
October 25 2024"

ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese

Un ambiente di lavoro stimolante e dinamico"

4,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=dfb20b4499f9e1d7&bb=uBfegPN4D30cx1tg_f6jznoHrlMsNlGoUlU5SxAly-ytZwEjy4CezxMm-tUQErk8HEs-beqQWX_p4UujGKkHiX0hHhZQYNdi9ym6j7FaCXfTlUp5XM4hwEdBIP0R0RXB&xkcb=SoBA67M37LfCEsQNqB0FbzkdCdPP&fccid=ce527f971de2a93a&vjs=3,Product+Analyst,"Milano, Lombardia",Pricing Analyst with French language,Swiss RE,"Milano, Lombardia",Not available,"Are you a highly motivated individual looking for an exciting opportunity to join our Life and Health Cont Europe Regional Team (CERPT) in Milan? Do you have a passion for actuarial pricing, client interactions and are looking for an adventurous role, where you can demonstrate technical, commercial, and personal leadership capability. If so, we want you to join our team!
About the Role

As a Life and Health Actuarial Pricing Analyst, you will play a crucial role in pricing life & health business across Continental Europe with a dedicated focus on French speaking countries. You will collaborate cross-functionally and with clients on pricing and product development opportunities, you will perform data analyses relating to emerging claims experience and monitor the performance of our reinsurance portfolio. Joining our team means gaining a deep understanding of the L&H reinsurance market and supporting us in providing high-quality actuarial input to cross-functional teams within Swiss Re.
Key responsibilities
Lead or support the development and review of pricing bases and reinsurance terms for new and established products
Ensure profitability of current portfolio is maintained in conjunction with our reporting and experience studies teams
Collaborate with clients and cross-functional teams on product development opportunities
Drive thought leadership and provide guidance to others
About the Team

Our Regional Pricing team operates within L&H Continental Europe. We pride ourselves on having a diverse team with a strong sense of community. Our leadership style is collaborative, and we work cross-functionally with our colleagues across Cont Europe, including pricing, client management, business management, underwriting, claims, and reporting teams. We like to have fun while delivering reinsurance pricing across a wide range of products in Central European markets. We are committed and supportive of one another and offer a flexible working environment where curious and adaptable people thrive.
About You
Graduation in actuarial field
Fluency in French and English languages with strong communication and presentation skills
1-2 years of actuarial experience, and/or familiarity with (re-)insurance structures and retail protection markets
Excellent knowledge of relevant actuarial and statistical models
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and independent decision-making abilities
Highly motivated with the ability to produce accurate, high-quality work, under pressure, managing multiple priorities
Comfortable independently owning deliverables and driving projects to execution
Strong customer focus with good negotiation skills
About Swiss Re

Swiss Re is one of the world’s leading providers of reinsurance, insurance and other forms of insurance-based risk transfer, working to make the world more resilient. We anticipate and manage a wide variety of risks, from natural catastrophes and climate change to cybercrime. We cover both Property & Casualty and Life & Health. Combining experience with creative thinking and cutting-edge expertise, we create new opportunities and solutions for our clients. This is possible thanks to the collaboration of more than 14,000 employees across the world.    Our success depends on our ability to build an inclusive culture encouraging fresh perspectives and innovative thinking. We embrace a workplace where everyone has equal opportunities to thrive and develop professionally regardless of their age, gender, race, ethnicity, gender identity and/or expression, sexual orientation, physical or mental ability, skillset, thought or other characteristics. In our inclusive and flexible environment everyone can bring their authentic selves to work and their passion for sustainability.    If you are an experienced professional returning to the workforce after a career break, we encourage you to apply for open positions that match your skills and experience.
Keywords:   Reference Code:  131143"

About Us

One of the keys to driving Responsible Growth is being a great place to work for our teammates around the world. We are devoted to being a diverse and inclusive workplace for everyone. Global Corporate Banking is focused on relationship management of global, large cap corporate clients, managing the day-to-day relationship as well as origination of new business with specific responsibility for delivering financing, treasury and risk management advice and execution to our clients globally.
Programme Overview:

Our Off-Cycle Analyst programme is designed to offer you a broad and exciting experience of what it is like to work as a full time Corporate Banking analyst. During your time at the bank, you will be placed within one of our country coverage teams, working across a diverse range of industries and products.

Your training and development are our top priority with extensive formal training offered at the start of the programme in addition to on-the-job support, educational speaker events and mentorship throughout.

Gain an in-depth understanding of our clients, the industries in which they operate and how the bank helps support both their growth aspirations and day-to-day banking requirements

Become proficient at credit analysis and the various metrics used to price and structure various debt instruments
Gain familiarity with the legal and documentation aspects of various debt instruments
Work on live transactions and interact with clients as you build your network and experience
Help to generate ideas and cross selling opportunities for new and existing clients
Assist in the development of client specific analysis (e.g., capital structure, acquisition finance)
Work closely with Investment Banking, Capital Markets and Global Transaction Services teams on client coverage and origination

Candidates are required to be in their penultimate or final year of study pursuing a degree from an accredited college or university
Applications are accepted from a diverse range of degree disciplines such as the arts and humanities, as well as numerically focused subjects such as economics and mathematics
Fluency in English is essential for all roles and a fluency in Italian is a strong preference
Candidates are required to be pursuing a BA/BS degree from an accredited college or university with a graduation timeframe between April 2025 and June 2026
Achieved minimum of 112 UCAS point (or equivalent) and on track for a minimum 2:1 degree classification (or equivalent)

You will need to demonstrate drive, innovation, and a genuine interest in the financial markets
Teamwork, leadership, and problem-solving skills, plus creativity are key qualities, as is the ability to work in a fast-paced environment, multi-task and interact with a variety of people
Analytical and problem-solving skills
Influences decisions and outcomes through effective communication and interpersonal skills
Integrity and ethics, earning trust and respect through consistent honesty and professionalism in all interactions
Our recruitment process

Analyst internship and full-time recruiting takes place on a rolling basis once our applications are open. Assessments often begin before the deadline, so it’s best to submit your application early as this will give you the best chance of being considered for the role.

Bulgari SPA, within its Global Merchandising Department based in  Rome , is searching for a  Jewelry & Watches Product Merchandising Analyst . The candidate will manage and maintain the Product database, ensuring its accuracy and timely updates, while providing essential support to the Merchandising team in analyzing sales performance and creating effective guidelines for product distribution.
Main Accountabilities
Product Database Management:
Maintain and update the Product database, serving as the main pillar of merchandising booklets and analyses.
Coordinate with Business Units’ Product Managers for the launch of new products and management of existing product life cycles.
Liaise with other Sales teams to define the third parties’ assortments.
Manage and update documents provided to Local Merchandisers, including Merchandising Guidelines, Phase out & Classification changes list, and Novelties booklet.
Portfolio, Merchandising & VM Guidelines:
Oversee the Portfolio and Merchandising guidelines booklets, ensuring accuracy and relevance.
Propose improvements to enhance the readability and effectiveness of the Guidelines.
Conduct simulations of future assortments to identify constraints for the drafting of Merchandising Guidelines. Assign Product Merchandising Types and determine maximum values for each Basket.
Collaborate on developing the Visual Merchandising Guidelines brief for Jewelry & Watches.
Sales Performance Analysis:
Assist the Manager in analyzing and reporting on the sales performance of the product assortment.
Profile
Qualifications / Professional Capabilities
Master’s degree in Economics, Statistics or Engineering.
3/4 years of experience in roles requiring strong analytical skills, with experience in database management, data cleaning, and number crunching (preferably within consultancy firms).
Data analysis, reporting and presentation skills.
MS Office suite (advanced Excel and Power Point).
Good command of Power BI.
Fluency in Italian and English.
Personal Competencies
Communication skills
Adaptability and flexibility
Teamworking
Creative thinking and innovative mindset
Attention to detail and excellence orientation
Proactive approach to problem-solving

What impact will you make?
Junior -   Data Analyst - Assurance
Sei pronto a  #MakeAnImpactThatMatters   nel nostro team  Audit & Assurance?
Entrando nel Team di Deloitte  Assurance Advisory   avrai l’occasione di crescere e sviluppare forti competenze trasversali, lavorando su progetti sfidanti e collaborando con moltissimi clienti.

Con la supervisione dei colleghi e colleghe più esperte, sarai responsabile delle attività progettuali nelle quali sarai coinvolto, e della qualità del tuo lavoro e del tuo allineamento alle priorità, agli obiettivi e alle esigenze dei clienti.
Grazie a questa esperienza, potrai acquisire un bagaglio culturale utile e ampio in questo ambito operando in una realtà leader nel settore.
Come verrai inserito in azienda?

I candidati e le candidate parteciperanno ad un percorso di selezione nel quale avranno la possibilità di mettersi alla prova attraverso giornate di assessment, con l’obiettivo di valorizzare competenze e potenzialità personali.
Saranno prese in considerazione tutte le candidature indistintamente, nel rispetto dei nostri valori ed in linea con la nostra cultura inclusiva.
#YourRole

In quanto  Analyst   avrai la possibilità di imparare dai colleghi più Senior (attraverso il  learning on the job ) e  sviluppare competenze tecniche e relazionali  lavorando in un contesto stimolante, che comporta sfide impegnative con ottime prospettive professionali.
In particolare, ti occuperai di:
Analisi dati su basi dati relazionali e NoSQL
Utilizzo di strumenti quali SQL, Qlik, Excel, Python, Power Platform
Sviluppo e mantenimento di progetti di Data Analytics (DataBase, ETL, Reportistica)
Utilizzo dei tipici tool quali Visual Studio, Sql Server Management Studio.
Grazie all’ufficio  Learning  avrai modo di seguire corsi e  attività di formazione  che ti permetteranno di ampliare e approfondire le tue conoscenze.

I colleghi del  Talent  invece, si occuperanno in maniera strutturata del tuo  avanzamento di carriera  con KPI e obiettivi definiti, che se raggiunti, ti garantiranno la revisione del grade e degli economics.
#WinningRequirements
Laurea  in Ingegneria, Informatica, Data Science
Spiccate capacità analitiche e attitudine al problem solving
Conoscenza dei concetti di organizzazione di un Data Warehouse
Propensione al lavoro in team
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
Ottime capacità relazionali e comunicative.
#NiceToHave
Costituisce titolo preferenziale la conoscenza uno fra: SQL Server, Power BI, Qlik, Power Apps
#LoveWorkingAtDeloitteIf
Vorresti intraprendere una  carriera professionale  nel  mondo della consulenza , dove la parola d’ordine è:  crescita
L’idea di  trasformare un problema in opportunità   ti stimola
Ti ritieni una persona empatica e quindi disponibile ad  acc ogliere le diverse esigenze   dei tuoi colleghi e degli stakeholder interni ed esterni
Ti piacerebbe imparare ad avere una  visione progettuale d’insieme , tenendo sempre a mente l’operatività per raggiungere gli obiettivi con integrità e rispetto degli standard Deloitte
Ti piace lavorare in  un ambiente sfidante  in cui le priorità possono cambiare quotidianamente
Ami  lavorare in team

Siamo alla ricerca di un/una Power BI Analyst da inserire nella nostra sede di Roma.   Entrare in Verisure significa avere la possibilità di lavorare in una realtà internazionale in continua crescita, attualmente formata da oltre 28.000 mila persone in 17 Paesi nel mondo, che ha come missione la protezione delle famiglie, delle loro case e delle attività commerciali. La passione per quello che facciamo e lo spirito innovativo sono parte del nostro DNA, che ci guida ogni giorno nel fare la differenza per le nostre persone, i nostri clienti e i nostri partner. Avrai infine la possibilità di unirti ad un team in cui ciascuno può esprimere le proprie potenzialità all'interno di un ambiente inclusivo, che mette al centro le persone.   In qualità di Power BI Analyst sarai inserito/a nel team Sales Planning & Strategy, all'interno del Dipartimento Sales. column3: Aggiornamento e valutazione qualitativa della reportistica giornaliera, settimanale e mensile
column4: Gestioni Ruoli di accesso e condivisione Dashboard con la struttura.    Requisiti:  Laurea in economia, ingegneria gestionale, statistica
column5: Esperienza di almeno 1-2 anni in mansioni analoghe
column6: Conoscenza avanzata di MS Office in particolare Power BI, Microsoft Excel, Power Point
column7: Ottima conoscenza linguaggio DAX
column8: Conoscenza modelli relazionali (uno a uno - uno a molti)

Chi siamo & cosa proponiamo
Software Partner Italia ricerca di 1 Data Analyst – Power B.I da inserire in un team di progetto presso i clienti della Società.
L’inizio dell’attività sarà Immediato e la durata del contratto sarà indeterminato.
Il tipo di contratto sarà a tempo indeterminato e richiede un impegno full-time presso la sede del cliente di Roma.
Cosa chiediamo
Siamo alla ricerca di una risorsa sveglia e motivata per unirsi al nostro team a Roma.
Se hai competenze nell’analisi dei dati e sei pronto a cogliere una nuova sfida, potresti essere la persona giusta per noi!
Requisiti:
Laurea, preferibilmente in discipline scientifiche o tecniche
Minimo 2 anni di esperienza nel campo dell’analisi dei dati
Conoscenza avanzata di Power BI e DAX
Buona padronanza di SQL
Voglia di fare e capacità di lavorare a stretto contatto con i clienti
Come candidarsi

Si prega di inviare il CV dettagliato in formato europeo all’indirizzo selezione.risorse@SWPItalia.com indicando il codice posizione ed autorizzando il trattamento dei dati personali ai sensi e per gli effetti del Decreto Legislativo 30 giugno 2003, n. 196 di cui all’art. 13, (Codice in materia di protezione dei dati personali) e del Regolamento UE 2016/679 sulla protezione dei dati (GDPR, General Data Protection Regulation UE 2016/679) e dichiarando di aver letto l’informativa sulla privacy di Software Partner Italia al seguente link. Si prega di non rispondere con candidature non inerenti all’offerte in quanto non saranno prese in considerazione.
L’offerta è rivolta a candidati di entrambi i sessi nel rispetto delle norme sulle parità di trattamento in materia di occupazione e di condizioni di lavoro (D.Lgs. 216/03)."

DXC Technology is looking for  Analytics  Business Analyst  to join Analytics DXC Offering.

DXC Analytics is focused on providing customers innovative solutions and high added value, in the following areas: Analytics Solutions and Services, Big Data Platforms, Information Governance, Business Intelligence & Data Management, Artificial Intelligence and IoT Analytics.
Job responsibilities:
Interact with clients in order to identify customer needs and translate them into requirements.
Collaborate with technical team, project manager and contribute to delivery activities during design, develop and maintenance of the solutions.
Design modern and scalable data architecture, to implement Business Intelligence reporting and technical/functional specifications.
Prioritizes the workload ensuring on time and on budget deliverables.
Qualifications:
Consolidated - at least 5 years - professional experience on BI/DWH projects.
Strong Experience on Data Modeling and on Advanced SQL.
Attitude to modelling and understanding of the data and the client’s business
Nice to have: Bachelor’s degree in one of the following areas: Computer Science, Computer engineering, Mathematical Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics, Knowledge of Public Sector.
We offer:

Being part of an highly-qualified team of 200 professionals with solid experience on Analytics Solutions and Services, Big Data Platforms, Information Governance, Business Intelligence & Data Management, Artificial Intelligence and IoT Analytics
International environment
Professional growth opportunities
Competitive remuneration package

From the first day, you will face with a reality that operates in more than 70 countries and formed through on the job training, technical training and soft skills, working inside a meritocratic reward system.

Thanks for taking the time to review our job, if you think it is a match to your experience and interests please apply today with CV in English - we are eager to learn more about you! If you know a friend who may be a fit for the job please refer them.
Location: Rome (RM) with remote work possibility
#LI-Hybrid

Recruitment fraud is a scheme in which fictitious job opportunities are offered to job seekers typically through online services, such as false websites, or through unsolicited emails claiming to be from the company. These emails may request recipients to provide personal information or to make payments as part of their illegitimate recruiting process. DXC does not make offers of employment via social media networks and DXC never asks for any money or payments from applicants at any point in the recruitment process, nor ask a job seeker to purchase IT or other equipment on our behalf. More information on employment scams is available here ."

BUSINESS ANALYST - BI:  La persona verrà inserita all'interno del settore IT, verrà coinvolta nell’ambito di progetti di BI. Si prevede inoltre che diventi referente per alcune applicazioni Web e App (locali e internazionali) utilizzate dalla Forza Vendita a livello di running.   PRINCIPALI ATTIVITA’  Raccolta dei business requirements per quanto attiene i progetti  Documentazione dei requisiti funzionali e non  Supporto implementazione da parte del fornitore, gestione delle fasi di test, preparazione di manuali per gli utenti finali  Definizione del piano di progetto insieme al team di sviluppo  Controllo delle milestone di progetto  Coordinamento dei fornitori IT  Coordinamento della maintenance per gli strumenti BI e applicazioni WEB   REQUISITI  Laurea triennale in Informatica / Ingegneria o equivalente  Esperienza di almeno 3 anni come Business Analyst o programmatore in progetti di Reportistica/BI  Propensione al lavoro in team  Efficace capacità di problem solving  Approccio strutturato, orientato al processo, multi-tasking e capacità di stabilire le priorità  Disponibilità ad imparare mostrando entusiasmo per la tecnologia con un atteggiamento proattivo, curiosità  Propensione al dialogo e ai rapporti interpersonali, inclusa la capacità di interagire professionalmente in un ambiente multiculturale con grande attitudine al lavoro di squadra ed elevato livello di autonomia  Strumenti di lavoro:  conoscenza base di Excel. Buona conoscenza dell'analisi dei dati, dei principali DataBase (SQL Server e/o Oracle)  Conoscenza degli strumenti di BI (Business Objects/Qlik/..)  La conoscenza dei linguaggi di programmazione Java o Net è considerata un plus  Buona padronanza della lingua inglese sia scritta che parlata"

Competenza nell'uso di strumenti di Business Intelligence (Power BI)
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.
Altre informazioni:
Orario Full-time, con possibilità di effettuare lo Smart Working per alcuni giorni della settimana.
Disponibilità ad effettuare brevi ed occasionali trasferte.
Disponibilità immediata."

1,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=39135a2943fd00c9&bb=IDxUHwuCrqazaA8AQ0ox5iu66fH4YVIuk-QFGpJnjloFqpDSA_2-ORfKCVMEh22aYx0mvL_EMFbw3NCsoxF3s2esEbmSnmVQVxmn6kOA_H3pNn4rJKkrg7K74aJe4sad&xkcb=SoAc67M37Lfy9329r50AbzkdCdPP&fccid=57a86589c7fcf7b9&vjs=3,BI+Analyst,"Roma, Lazio","Junior Power BI Analyst (Remote, Contract)",INFUSE,"Remoto in Roma, Lazio",Not available,"OUR HIRING PROCESS:

We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.

We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.

At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting or Zoom, where you will meet our INFUSE team.

From there on, it's decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSE and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live. After all, we consider our team members our family, and we want you to feel comfortable and welcomed.

Are you passionate about transforming data into actionable insights? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment where your analytical skills can make a real impact? Join our team as a Junior Power BI Analyst and embark on an exciting journey to drive data-driven decision-making within our organization. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge BI tools, collaborate with talented professionals, and contribute to innovative projects that shape our business strategy. If you are eager to grow your career in data analytics and possess a keen eye for detail, we invite you to be part of our forward-thinking team. Unleash your potential and help us unlock the power of data!   Responsibilities :
Design dashboards in Microsoft Power BI and build business intelligence reports according to the needs.  Clean and ensure accuracy and integrity of data
column2: review data for inconsistencies or anomalies.   Maintain dashboards to identify reporting issues or gaps and drive timely resolution.   Prepare clear and concise reports.   Development, optimization, and support of existing analytical reports.   Identify opportunities for improvements.   Implement the best practices in collaboration with other team members.

column1: Requirements:

Strong data visualization (experience with Power BI or similar tools) and presentation skills.   Strong data analysis and problem-solving skills.   Excel knowledge (incl. pivot tables, dashboard creation).  Ability to work with large volumes of data
column2: extrapolate conclusions from a variety of data sources, both quantitative and qualitative.  Strong DAX & SQL knowledge, Python will be an advantage.  English proficiency (Upper Intermediate or higher)"

Siamo alla ricerca di un/una  Credit & Collection Data Analyst  da inserire nel nostro HQ di Roma.

Entrare in  Verisure  significa avere la possibilità di lavorare in una realtà internazionale in continua crescita, attualmente formata da oltre 28.000 mila persone in 17 Paesi nel mondo, che ha come missione la protezione delle famiglie, delle loro case e delle attività commerciali. La passione per quello che facciamo e lo spirito innovativo sono parte del nostro DNA, che ci guida ogni giorno nel fare la differenza per le nostre persone, i nostri clienti e i nostri partner. Avrai infine la possibilità di unirti ad un team in cui ciascuno può esprimere le proprie potenzialità all’interno di un ambiente inclusivo, che mette al centro le persone.
In qualità di  Credit & Collection Data Analyst  lavorerai nel team Billing & Credit, all’interno del Dipartimento Finance.
Quali saranno le tue responsabilità:
Sviluppo della reportistica per le aree di fatturazione e recupero del credito, riportando direttamente al Manager della funzione
Sviluppo di analisi per valutare l'impatto di iniziative specifiche sulle performance del team
Supporto alla definizione e realizzazione di strategie data driven
Creazione e condivisione della reportistica ufficiale per il Management
Supporto alle verifiche di Data Quality
Analisi, individuazione e sviluppo di nuove soluzioni di Business Intelligence a partire dall'architettura degli attuali strumenti di reportistica (E.g. Power BI, etc.)
Supporto al consolidamento dei processi di analisi dati trasversali e allo sviluppo delle analisi E2E.
Quali conoscenze ed esperienze cerchiamo:
Esperienza pregressa di almeno 2 anni in mansioni analoghe
Preferibile conoscenza dei processi in ambito Credit & Collection
Laurea in Economia, Ingegneria Gestionale, Statistica
Ottima conoscenza di Excel e preferibile conoscenza di Power BI
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.
Di che cosa avrai bisogno:
Ottima capacità di analisi, sintesi e visione sistemica
Orientamento al problem solving e attitudine al miglioramento continuo
Precisione, organizzazione ed orientamento al risultato
Forte attitudine al team working, ottime capacità relazionali e comunicative
Flessibilità, adattabilità e motivazione a lavorare in un contesto in forte espansione.

Interested in being part of a dedicated, passionate team which believes that security is a human right? Looking to join a company where innovation and technology are at the heart of its solutions? Join us today!  Operating in 17 countries throughout Europe and Latin America, with more than 28,000 employees and more than 5,000,000 customers, Verisure is among the global leaders in the professionally monitored security system industry.
We are searching for:  Financial Planning & Control Analyst  in our Rome HQ.

The candidate will support the Financial Planning & Control team in the analysis of actual business performance and in the definition of prospective/forecast company’s results, with strong focus on revenues and costs, through continuous interactions with all corporate departments. The candidate will also be involved in strategic initiatives, critical for the business future development, with broad visibility to the company’s top management.
Key responsibilities
Monthly and Quarterly P&L closing with reporting to managing team
Support internal stakeholders in the definition of forecast and budget company’s results
Revenue and cost structure analysis and optimization
Business performance measurement and analysis of variances
Design trusted and intuitive business reports and KPIs on actual figures
Design and deploy new dashboards on Finance and corporate data
Participate in strategic projects, even with international reach
Support in the redaction of presentations and analysis for institutional meetings
Requirements
Degree in Economics, Engineering, Statistics or Mathematics
Preferably 1-2 years of experience in same or similar role
Advanced knowledge of Office programs, especially Excel and PowerPoint
Strong “can-do” mentality and “drive” to accomplish tasks and deliver results
Good teamwork, positive attitude, and flexibility
Able to work in an international environment and with international teams
Fluent in English
Spanish, knowledge of Power BI and strong sense of curiosity as a plus
What we offer
Competitive remuneration
Rapid career growth and professional development
Continuous education and training
Certified “Great place to work”
Total remuneration will be commensurate based on the profile and work experiences.
Location: Rome

Verisure is an equal opportunities employer and positively encourages applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of sex, race, disability, age, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, religion or belief, marital status, or pregnancy and maternity. (L.903/77 e L.125/91)."

column1: Altri dati:
Sede: Roma
Titolo di studio: Laurea
Tipologia di impiego: Full time

Tipologia contratto: Tempo indeterminato  INVIA IL TUO CURRICULUM      Chi siamo:    CGM Consulting si occupa di  soluzioni informatiche  per grandi aziende.   Da sempre al fianco dei più importanti System Integrator, è diventata un partner tecnologico fondamentale per la realizzazione di progetti in ambito  bancario ,  assicurativo  e  automotive .   Negli ultimi anni ha realizzato e commercializzato gestionali al mercato B2B.   Investire nella  formazione  e nell’ aggiornamento  dei propri dipendenti è per CGM Consulting una priorità assoluta, permettendo di ottenere un’elevata qualità nella realizzazione dei progetti.      Lavora con noi:    Tutte le candidature verranno prese in esame e valutate.   Nel caso il tuo curriculum non corrisponda ai criteri richiesti, potremo tenerlo in considerazione per future selezioni.      Le ricerche si intendono riferite a persone di entrambi i sessi (L. 903/77).    Per visionare tutte le ricerche attive ti invitiamo a consultare il seguente link:  www.cgmconsulting.it/lavora-con-noi/    Puoi inviare il tuo curriculum vitae in formato .doc o .pdf anche su  recruiting@cgmconsulting.it  indicando il riferimento al presente annuncio"

CHI SIAMO

Acea è una Multiutilities che ha come Mission quella di migliorare ogni giorno la vita dei cittadini offrendo servizi essenziali di alta qualità per la vita quotidiana delle persone – acqua, energia, illuminazione e trattamento rifiuti.
COSA FARAI
La struttura Business & Process Transformation ricerca figure Senior e Junior che nello specifico si occuperanno di:
Condurre analisi di ottimizzazione dei Processi
Identificare soluzioni di miglioramento in sinergia con le funzioni di Business e Corporate
Condurre analisi di costi-benefici per le soluzioni identificate
Curare il Project Management delle attività, predisponendo report di avanzamento
Interagire con gli stakeholder interni di Business/Funzione, creando e sviluppando solide relazioni.
CHI SEI
Sei in possesso di Laurea preferibilmente in Ingegneria o Economia Aziendale
Hai ottime capacità analitiche ed espositive degli output di analisi
Possiedi ottime capacità relazionali e di gestione degli stakeholder
Hai una buona conoscenza di Office 365 (e.g., PPT, Excel)
E’ gradita la competenza anche di strumenti di ri-disegno dei processi o strumenti in uso in Azienda (e.g. ServiceNow, Power BI, Jira)
Ti distingui per un elevata proattività ed una forte propensione al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Ti distingui per l’attitudine al lavoro in team ed un ottimo problem solving.
CON NOI POTRAI
Lavorare in un ambiente innovativo, in continua crescita, contribuendo a migliorare la qualità e la sostenibilità del mondo in cui viviamo.

Potrai far parte di un Gruppo che si impegna tutti i giorni nel migliorare il benessere delle proprie persone con l’attivazione di progetti volti a promuovere la Salute, il Benessere psico fisico, le misure di Conciliazione Vita Lavoro e di Incentivazione.

Un Gruppo orientato ad accrescere le competenze, che monitora le aree di forza e di miglioramento e adotta approcci strutturati di Formazione e Sviluppo, volti a favorire la crescita individuale per la valorizzazione e il riconoscimento del merito.
SEDE DI LAVORO :  Roma

Il Gruppo Acea certificato Top Employer promuove l’inclusione e la valorizzazione dell’individualità di ogni persona coinvolta nei propri processi selettivi contrastando qualsiasi forma di discriminazione"

2,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=1b5e64793902b30c&bb=za6FGqHSwo4HxnBneXkfg4qoBVwXFdMuQOLn-33oGsf0oq58vlhZaXNQUNaSygngeT9xz4kewEYkb3LNPoxuusTeDLjwpmQozhTYYnAH156pRiesR9Bb6K1IWk1mOCLH&xkcb=SoA667M37LQbbSgKV70JbzkdCdPP&fccid=c7fb5f7b576a671c&vjs=3,BI+Analyst,"Roma, Lazio",Data Analyst,BIP - Business Integration Partners,"Remoto in Roma, Lazio",Not available,"Data Analyst
JOB DESCRIPTION
Entra nel nostro mondo.
Trasforma insieme a noi.
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.
Data Analyst
Quale sarà la tua sfida?
Entra a far parte di BIP xTech, il Centro di Eccellenza di BIP specializzato in consulenza e servizi innovativi in ambito Data Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, RPA, Cloud, Blockchain e Networking.

In particolare, verrai considerato per far parte di DANA, il Competence Team di xTech che accoglie i nostri consulenti Data Analyst – figure professionali che combinano competenze informatiche e statistiche con l’interesse per il business e i processi operativi dei nostri clienti. Il team segue progetti di lungo, medio e breve termine, con attività quali:
Estrazione, pulizia, modellazione e analisi dati, con strumenti tipici del settore (quali MS Excel, SQL, SAS e Python)
Costruzione di modelli analitici e di reportistica interattiva con MS Excel
Automazione di processi operativi tramite modelli MS Excel avanzati, macro VBA, ed eventuali altre tecnologie a supporto

Supporto all’operatività dei clienti nell’esecuzione dei processi, utilizzando le proprie competenze tecniche specifiche per individuare ed implementare soluzioni di efficientamento, anche in collaborazione con colleghi xTech con altre specializzazioni
Analisi funzionali in ambito dati e IT
column2: Project management in ambito dati e IT.

column1: Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior che senior.

Ti sarà richiesto, in modo commisurato alla tua seniority, di dimostrare ed evolvere le capacità di costruire relazioni con clienti, vendor e partner, promuovendo il raggiungimento degli obbiettivi aziendali.
Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team?
Core Skills:

Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Gestionale, Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni, Informatica, Statistica, Marketing, Economia, Management, Scienze Politiche o altre discipline con metodi quantitativi
Ottima competenza con MS Excel, pivot e formule
Ottima competenza con il linguaggio SQL
Buona conoscenza di concetti di RDBMS
Buona conoscenza di almeno un linguaggio di programmazione
Buone competenze statistiche
Conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese
Plus:
Ottima competenza con il linguaggio VBA
Buona competenza con la suite SAS (Base/Guide/Viya)
Buona competenza con MS Access
Buona competenza con il linguaggio Python
Buona conoscenza delle principali tecnologie Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure) e dei relativi servizi in ambito dati
Conoscenza di tecnologie di Business Intelligence (Power BI, Qlik Sense, Tableau)
Conoscenza base di tecnologie di Robotic Process Automation
Conoscenza base di tecnologie di Process Mining
Conoscenza base di tecnologie CRM (es. Salesforce)
Conoscenza base di tecnologie ERP (es. SAP)
Conoscenza di altri linguaggi di programmazione
Soft Skills:
Standing consulenziale
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine e flessibilità a lavorare sia in team sia in autonomia
Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze Disponibilità per trasferte in Italia e all’estero
Perchè Bip?
People at the center of our culture
Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.
Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
Challenging yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.
Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.
Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.
Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.
Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente."

2,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=83c4aed1ad14c7cf&bb=za6FGqHSwo4HxnBneXkfg4b-Sm3HKHx7SAgbGHjMmgRY-Mays1m3zDbyOS0_FrwzpRVweqWXZZTURc5M9w8G4cEe4Rp8LDBmm9c9KfwJMtAYED3Q14dDnlgwEDGJjAiy&xkcb=SoCO67M37LQbbSgKV70IbzkdCdPP&fccid=b8da1e64b814cf1f&vjs=3,BI+Analyst,"Roma, Lazio",Junior Marketing Analyst,Immobiliare.it,"Roma, Lazio",Not available,"Immobiliare.it   is the Digital Tech Company leader in Italy among real estate portals. Our web and mobile products are developed in-house and every day we work to offer the best platform to publish and search for real estate listings, to evaluate properties and keep informed on housing market trends and news.
Innovation, technological excellence and attention for the user are the values that allow us to reach our objectives and continuously grow.
Marketing Team :
Our team is responsible for all marketing activities of our Group: Immobiliare.it (Italy), Indomio.es (Spain), Immotop.lu (Luxembourg) and LuxuryEstate (Global).
We focus mainly on:

Performance Marketing:   we design, create and manage campaigns with different business objectives (e.g. user acquisition and engagement, lead generation and brand awareness). We are one of the top advertisers in our markets, we collaborate with the best partners and our strong relationship with them allow us to develop ad-hoc projects and to access new features, products and technologies before they’re widely released

Analytics : every interaction with our products generates data that can be leveraged to understand our customers and their experience, to uncover opportunities and support decisions that enable marketing success by translating insights into meaningful actions

Market and Competitor Insights : we study the real estate market and our industry to uncover emerging trends, discover business opportunities and forecast demand as accurately as possible to stay ahead of the curve
Projects:   we drive growth, operational and technological improvements working   cross-team and cross-competence (Tech, Product, Sales, PR & Content teams).
We are looking for a  Marketing Analyst  to join our team.
What you will learn :

design and manage marketing campaigns across different channels (e.g. Search, Display, Video, Affiliate) and Advertising Platforms (e.g. Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Criteo, DV360) to reach different business objectives

analyse data from web & app analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics, MMPs, Mixpanel), adv platforms and many other data sources, organise and visualise results clearly with bi tools (e.g. Looker, Tableau) and translate insights into actions
analyse the real estate market and our industry trends using publicly available data (e.g. Google searches, online research) and competitive intelligence tools (e.g. Similarweb, data.ai, Semrush).
Who you are:
new graduate in Economics, Statistics, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics
analytical mindset with a problem solving approach
curious and passionate about digital marketing and tech platforms
fluent in English.
What we offer :
a young and dynamic work environment
an opportunity in a fast-growing company
paid internship contract
ticket restaurants
free coffee and fresh fruit every day
break room with a foosball table
office located in the centre of Rome (Termini).
This announcement is addressed to people of any sex, pursuant to laws 903/77 and 125/91, and to people of all ages and all nationalities, pursuant to legislative decrees 215/03 and 216/03."

2,Italy,https://it.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=f76c9e5766c85c3a&bb=za6FGqHSwo4HxnBneXkfgwI3iKw-wzt1qkxbp9b5et4uadtpgOzehACCRKQD5qz00MR_2kpes6Y9tEBWGprDsN6QjFDyxg0SOJeEGK93O8wG-jGc7EluZ5d4_EGgxg56&xkcb=SoAp67M37LQbbSgKV70NbzkdCdPP&fccid=c7fb5f7b576a671c&vjs=3,BI+Analyst,"Roma, Lazio",Martech Analyst,BIP - Business Integration Partners,"Remoto in Roma, Lazio",Not available,"Entra nel nostro mondo.
Trasforma insieme a noi.
Martech Analyst
Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Sarai parte attiva della crescita di  xTech  , Practice che con oltre 500 professionisti e professioniste altamente specializzati negli ambiti Data & AI, Cloud, Digital Platforms and Solutions e nella creazione di soluzioni end-to-end per supportare le aziende clienti nella trasformazione digitale.
Le posizioni aperte riguardano profili sia junior, sia intermediate, neolaureati o con almeno 1 anno di esperienza maturata in società di consulenza direzionale o informatica.

La figura sarà responsabile dell'analisi quantitativa e qualitativa del comportamento degli utenti attraverso le risorse digitali, per identificare le informazioni chiave e ottimizzare i flussi di navigazione.

Inoltre, la figura si occuperà sia della definizione della tracking architecture e dell’implementazione dei relativi event tags che dello sviluppo e della manutenzione del dashboard reporting per una comprensione approfondita del customer journey.
La figura supporterà i/le Martech Engineer e i/le Martech Architect nell'implementazione e nell’integrazione di soluzioni verticali.
Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro Team?
Requisiti Indispensabili:
Conoscenza approfondita dei principali strumenti di Digital Analytics e di Tag Management (Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager)
Conoscenza della Data Visualization e degli strumenti di BI (Google Data Studio, Power BI)
Conoscenza degli strumenti di ottimizzazione CRO e UX (Google Optimize, Adobe Target, Hotjar)
Conoscenza dei database relazionali (SQL) Conoscenza di base dei linguaggi di front-end (HTML, Javascript)
Plus:
Conoscenza degli strumenti di Digital Advertising (Google Ads, Google S360, Google D&V360, Meta Business Manager)
Conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione come Python o R

Verrà data priorità ai candidati e alle candidate che, in sede di intervista, dimostreranno di avere un’attitudine allo sviluppo e alla ricerca di soluzioni innovative.
Perchè Bip?
People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone. Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.
Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.
Unlocking your potential
Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.
Work-life Integration
Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.
Diversity, Equity and Inclusion
Valorizziamo l'unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all'inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.
Promuoviamo l'inserimento e l'integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette - in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99-.
Next Steps
Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.
Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.
L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.
L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.
In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.
Se dovessi identificare tu stesso ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.
Su di Noi
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse."

Trasforma insieme a noi.
Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.
Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.
Data Analyst
Quale sarà la tua sfida?
Entra a far parte di BIP xTech, il Centro di Eccellenza di BIP specializzato in consulenza e servizi innovativi in ambito Data Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, RPA, Cloud, Blockchain e Networking.

In particolare, verrai considerato/a per far parte di DANA, il Competence Team di xTech che accoglie i nostri consulenti Data Analyst – figure professionali che combinano competenze informatiche e statistiche con l’interesse per il business e i processi operativi dei nostri clienti. Il team segue progetti di lungo, medio e breve termine, con attività quali:
Estrazione, pulizia, modellazione e analisi dati, con strumenti tipici del settore (quali MS Excel, SQL, SAS e Python)
Costruzione di modelli analitici e di reportistica interattiva con MS Excel
Automazione di processi operativi tramite modelli MS Excel avanzati, macro VBA, ed eventuali altre tecnologie a supporto

Supporto all’operatività dei clienti nell’esecuzione dei processi, utilizzando le proprie competenze tecniche specifiche per individuare ed implementare soluzioni di efficientamento, anche in collaborazione con colleghi xTech con altre specializzazioni
Analisi funzionali in ambito dati e IT
column2: Project management in ambito dati e IT.

column1: La posizione aperta riguarda profili con un’esperienza pregressa di almeno 2-5 anni, maturata in ruoli equivalenti.

Ti sarà richiesto, in modo commisurato alla tua seniority, di dimostrare ed evolvere le capacità di costruire relazioni con clienti, vendor e partner, promuovendo il raggiungimento degli obiettivi aziendali.
Sarai tu a unirti al nostro team?

Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Gestionale, Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Ingegneria delle Telecomunicazioni, Informatica, Statistica, Marketing, Economia, Management, Scienze Politiche o altre discipline con metodi quantitativi
Ottima competenza con MS Excel, pivot e formule
Ottima competenza con il linguaggio SQL

Conoscenza base di tecnologie di Process Mining

MBDA rappresenta il primo Gruppo a livello europeo con capacità di produzione e progettazione in grado di coprire l’intera gamma corrispondente alle attuali e future esigenze delle forze armate (terra, aria e mare).
All’interno della Direzione “Programmi” MBDA Italia SpA è alla ricerca di un “Business Analyst SAP S4” da inserire nel team PMO.
Attività previste per il ruolo :
La risorsa prescelta si occuperà delle seguenti attività:
Analisi dei Processi definiti nei documenti di riferimento
Partecipazione alle attività di setup di progetto per la definizione degli strumenti da utilizzare per l’implementazione della metodologia Agile
Partecipazione alle sessioni di lavoro del team internazionale di progetto, in particolare per tutte le attività afferenti l’area dei Programmi
Valutazione dei Reports, Interface, Conversion, Enhancements, Forms, and Workflow da discutere nelle sessioni di lavoro
Gestione del processo di implementazione del nuovo SAP S/4 supportando le funzioni di riferimento durante il periodo della transizione e fino al deployment.
Partecipazione alle fasi di preparazione ed implementazione di data cleansing, data migration
Supporto operativo alla definizione delle delivery, dei punti di controllo da evidenziare nelle sessioni di test
Interfaccia vs reparto di Information Management e relativi riferimenti per tutti gli aspetti tecnici
Assicurare il corretto scambio di informazioni e coordinamento nell’ambito della gestione di Programma e gestione del Progetto, ma anche all’esterno (per mezzo dei Referenti)
Verifiche integrazione sistemi e interfacce custom (SAP PS-PRIMAVERA, SAP PS-Cost planning)
Supporto alla stesura dei nuovi processi di Project & Contract Management seguenti all’implementazione del nuovo sistema
Partecipazione alle sessioni di lavoro nazionali per definire e implementare le interfacce con altri tool (es.: tool di gestione delle Licenze)
Raccolta e condivisione dei requisiti in comune con le altre NatCo (anche a livello funzionale) ai fini della definizione di soluzioni standard
Produzione dei report periodici di avanzamento
Produzione delle presentazioni di sintesi periodiche del lavoro svolto e dei punti aperti vs gli stakeholder

Ottima conoscenza e utilizzo dei moduli gestionali SAP PS, CPM, SAP BPC (financial reporting)

Buona conoscenza dei principi di Project Management

Capacità di team working
